attributes.action: Suspend Party Politics in the commons and instate only leave and remain.
attributes.additional_details: Go to an election format and allow each constituency to vote only for a leave or remain candidate selected from across parties based on their allegiance to Brexit. Once the result is complete the Commons can debate any brexit activity with a clear mandate from the people.
attributes.background: Party Politics is hampering the UK and its future. Only by suspending party politics and simplifying the commons on a short term basis will get a result reflective of the publics opinion.

rejection.details:
The Government or Parliament can't suspend political parties or prevent them putting forward candidates.

You could start a new petition calling for a clear action that is the responsibility of the UK Government or Parliament.
